seduce.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to persuade someone to have sex with you, especially in a way that is attractive and not too direct
seduce.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The professor was sacked for seducing female students.
Are you trying to seduce me?
seduce.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to make someone want to do something by making it seem very attractive or interesting to them
seduce.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I was young and seduced by New York.
Leaders are people who can seduce other people into sharing their dream.
seduce.translation[0].definitions[1].not: Seduce is often passive in this meaning
